ModMetaData.name: More Hydroponics Crops (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Wa Ges mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1685020834
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/MoreHydroponicsCrops
--- Original Description --- Adds the ability to grow more vanilla crops (Corn, Devilstrand, Haygrass) in a Hydroponics Basin, as well as adding a new plant, the cocoa bush. This plant grows cocoa beans.
